Eve D'Souza (a mụrụ na 11 Machị 1979) bụ onye mgbasa ozi Kenya, onye na-egosi redio na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye ngosi redio na 98.4 Capital FM site n'afọ 2001 ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ na ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2010
A mụrụ D'Souza na 11 Machị, 1979 na Mombasa, Kenya nye Andrew na Martina D’Souza
O nwere ụmụnne abụọ, Sharon na Jason D’Souza
Ọ gara Loreto Convent na Aga Khan High School, Mombasa
O mechara sonye na Mahadum Katọlik nke Eastern Africa, Nairobi ebe o nwetara nzere bachelọ nke agụmakwụkwọ na Bekee na Bekee.
D'Souza lụrụ Simon Anderson na 16 Nọvemba 2020 na agbamakwụkwọ nzuzo

N'afọ 2001, ọ sonyeere 98.4 Capital FM ruo n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2010 na-akwado ihe ngosi Mid morning, Hits not Home work, The East African Chart na Capital in the Morning
D'Souza mechara rụọ ọrụ Moonbeam Productions, onye na-emepụta telivishọn na-ahụ maka Auntie Boss!, sitcom nke ọ na-emepụta ma na-eme ihe nkiri, wee bụrụ "onye nnọchi anya" maka Store 66, ụlọ ahịa uwe na Nairobi.
